mn87:3.8: evametaṃ, gahapati → evameva gahapati (bj sakideva) | evametaṃ gahapati (pts1 sakideva)
mn87:3.10: Kassa kho → kissa nu kho (bj) | tassa kho (s1-3)
mn87:8.3: rathikāya rathikaṃ → rathiyāya rathiyaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn87:22.5: tvaṃ → tayā (bj) | taṃ (si, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn87:29.2: ativijjha maññe → ativijjha paññāya (pts1) | paṭivijjha paññāya (mr)
